comments:
Today, suddenly the Java editor go crazy by change source code by just clicking 
in the editor with the mouse. I tried to undo the trash via CTRL-Z and then I 
got a "Abnormal Workbench Condition" dialog. I closed Eclipse and found this in 
the .log:

Which Eclipse build were you running when you got the problem?
(If you aren't sure, check Help>About Eclipse SDK)

When the Java editor "went crazy"...
  - what were the symptoms before you tried to undo?
  - had you been editing for some time in that editor before it happened?

cc'ing Dani - fyi.
An exception occurred during undo, but something was going wrong before hand.  
I would be less surprised if this occurred before our modification stamp 
validation code was put into RC2.

Still waiting to find out what build this problem was observed on.

Please provide more info. See also the questions and answers in the duplicate PRs.
